name: Cut the Loveballs
description:
“Distant mean so little, when someone mean so much”.
Let’s cut the block and unite the love balls.

Cut the Love Balls is the newest physics puzzles game to train your mind with hundreds of levels and master your logical thinking skill. Using only your wisdom and imagination, you can heal the breach and bring the love balls together!

Feature:
Free to play, play it anytime and anywhere.
Suitable for all age.
Simple, smart and fun challenge for your brain
Various couples of ball for you to collect
Challenge your brain and your imagination!

Use your brain, draw the line, create the ways so the love balls can roll to their love.
